summary: How to create overlayItem by click on map?

comments.content:
Hello
I'm developing an android program with Osmdroid & custom map. I want that the users could click on map to add a point ( overlayItem ) and then forward to an other activiy. how can I push a pin on map by clicking on it? thanks.

You can have a look here: http://code.google.com/p/osmbonuspack

Implementation is done here:
http://code.google.com/p/osmbonuspack/source/browse/trunk/OSMBonusPack/src/org/osmdroid/bonuspack/overlays/MapEventsOverlay.java

And this class is used here: 
http://code.google.com/p/osmbonuspack/source/browse/trunk/OSMBonusPackDemo/src/com/osmbonuspackdemo/MapActivity.java
